title: Learning Locker UI Integration
description: Create admin interface and dashboard integration for Learning Locker data exploration

task_tracking.notes: UI agent will create admin interface for Learning Locker management

subtasks.title: Learning Locker Admin Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create admin dashboard for Learning Locker sync management and status monitoring
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows sync status and statistics

subtasks.title: Statement Browser Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate Learning Locker statement browser into admin interface with filtering and search
acceptance_criteria: Advanced filtering by actor, verb, object

subtasks.title: Data Export Interface
subtasks.description: Create interface for exporting xAPI statements in various formats

subtasks.title: Analytics Dashboard Enhancement
subtasks.description: Enhance existing analytics dashboard with Learning Locker data visualization

subtasks.title: User Access Management
subtasks.description: Create user management interface for Learning Locker access control

ui_testing.notes: Test all UI components and user interactions

integration_testing.notes: Test UI integration with Learning Locker backend

user_acceptance_testing.notes: Verify UI meets team data checking requirements

agent_handoff.handoff_notes: UI agent completes Learning Locker interface, testing agent validates functionality
